channel.title: An open source implementation of WaveNet vocoder
channel.description: Recent content on An open source implementation of WaveNet vocoder

item.title: index
item.description: Github: https://github.com/r9y9/wavenet_vocoder This page provides audio samples for the open source implementation of the WaveNet vocoder, which can generate raw speech samples conditioned on linguistic or acoustic features. References Aaron van den Oord, Sander Dieleman, Heiga Zen, et al, “WaveNet: A Generative Model for Raw Audio”, arXiv:1609.03499, Sep 2016. Aaron van den Oord, Yazhe Li, Igor Babuschkin, et al, “Parallel WaveNet: Fast High-Fidelity Speech Synthesis”, arXiv:1711.
